issue.title: [Urban Feature] Access to simulation robot logfile?

content.raw:
We are publishing to `/robot_data` but the only mention related to it I was able to find was in `master.log`:

`[rosmaster.master][INFO] 2019-11-24 11:24:38,421: +PUB [/robot_data] /subt_solution http://10.40.136.4:46763/`

I couldn’t find any rosbag in the files available to us.

‌
content.html:
